dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4598 IH: To amend the Small Business Act to require public communications about disaster assistance resources to be made in multiple languages.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Meng (for herself, Ms. Velázquez, Mr. Soto, and Miss González-Colón of Puerto Rico) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to require public communications about disaster assistance resources to be made in multiple languages.

section.header: Requirement for public communications about disaster assistance resources to be made in multiple languages
section.text: Section 7(b)(5) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(b)(5)) is amended by inserting in multiple languages, after web-based outlets,.
